About The Role: The Trust & Safety team at Notion is looking for a full-time Fraud & Abuse Analyst to join our operational account security team. As a Fraud & Abuse Analyst, you'll work closely with our engineers & business teams and review account behavior for unexpected activity. You'll work with our support teams and directly with our users to resolve risk-related issues, while building out systems and processes to manage escalations from report to completion. You will problem-solve with our technical & business teams and resolve as much as you can while building processes that will scale as we do. This role is open in both our New York and San Francisco offices, with a preference for NYC. What You'll Achieve: Help develop user-facing risk monitoring processes, perform account • reviews, and manage account activity escalations • Work with Engineering teams to build better account review and moderation tools • Help investigate, draft, and implement fraud & abuse policy & operations with Legal and Security • Respond to high priority customer and internal escalations related to account access, user behavior, and compliance screenings • Manage to key performance metrics defined within Platform Security • Create and maintain internal knowledge libraries and contribute to the creation of user-facing content • Provide materials and training to our BPO partners and maintain outsourcing resources through regular audits & updates • Participate in a semi-quarterly on-call rotation to provide support during high-priority incidents Our customers come from all walks of life and so do we.
